name: Space Survival (itch) (AllawiDev)
description:
This is my first ever game i have made its a simple space survival game, you have 2 game modes (survival and collecting stars)

Survival is to not get hit by the spaceships, and its getting faster if you get high scores

Collecting stars its just collecting stars and dont let the star get hit to bottom of your screen bcz you will lose, and getting faster and faster if get higher score

(sorry for my bad english)
